CustomField.description: Used by the scheduled flow to set the contract to inactive.
CustomField.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Won"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Professional Services")), End_date_contract__c < TODAY(), Contract_IsActive__c = TRUE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used by the scheduled flow to set the contract to inactive.
CustomField.label: Flow: Is Active False
